segments.text: This whole scene is frankly infuriating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is just gushing water, what a terrible waste!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flowing everywhere, damaging the kitchen, and nobody cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right there, completely oblivious to the puddle around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can you not notice your feet are soaking wet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredibly irresponsible to leave a faucet running like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're up to no good, clearly stealing cookies from that jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is going to fall off that unstable stool, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone supervising them or dealing with the water?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a total mess, and it could all be avoided with a bit of attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a surge of irritation just watching the negligence play out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a prime example of domestic chaos that could have been prevented.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and take charge of this situation immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's driving me absolutely mad to see it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
